thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Justin Leverenz
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Justin Leverenz

author: Justin Leverenz
title: Justin Leverenz
text: FramesDirect is the best! I ordered one pair after taking my own measurements (super easy!) and they weren't just perfect, so I returned them for free and got a pair just slightly different that I love! I've been wearing them for months and they are sleek and fashionable while also being durable in my clumsy life. I highly recxoment FramesDirect!
